name: Meat Cute
description:
A game about beauty & attraction:

The god of love, Cupid journeyed to the land of Meat Cute. In this realm from an unknown dimension, the inhabitants are sentient severed human body parts. No one knows its origin. Some believe it has existed since the beginning of time: Rumour has it that the land itself is the God of Creation's very own sandbox environment for prototyping human beings. These body parts have an eternal lifespan and their existence is extremely painful and lonely. Cupid has taken pity on these body parts and therefore decided to use his “bow of attraction” to connect them with one another.

NOTE: For the best experience, download the desktop build. The web build above has a number of issues, such as increased limb spawn rate, due to the usage of system generated random numbers.

Instructions

Use your bow to attach limbs to the Cuties and match Cuties together! Matching naked cuties deducts points from your score, while following the current body image trend (top left corner) grants bonus points and time.

Controls

Move: WASD
Shoot: LMB

Watch the official Meat Cute Play Through!
